TopicTitle: Harvest II, the most heavily armed fighter-bomber I've ever created.

Articles.Content:
It's a heavily armed fighter-bomber aircraft, equipped with STO boosters, and armed with:

2 x heavy guided Air to Ground missiles

5 x small air to air or ground missiles

9 x unguided 150kg bombs

User Manual:

Throttle up and set the first stage engines running. At 90 m/s stage again to fire the short take off boosters and pull back on the stick hard.

Approach your target at 5 degrees nose up from the horizon, and stage again to launch the two heavy air-ground missiles. Press your "]" key to control one of the missiles and guide it to your target. Circle the target and stage indiscriminately another six times to bomb your target. Then stage each air-air missile and switch to it to guide it into approaching enemy aircraft or soft ground targets.

Once your weapon load has been depleted, climb to 20 000 and cruise at hypersonic speed to return to base and outrun any pursuing aircraft.

Edit: I almost forgot. Press action group 1 to unleash hell.
